venue.address_2: across from Roxbury Crossing Orange Line station
venue.address_1: 1350 Tremont St, cor. New Dudley St
venue.name: Reggie Lewis Center

item.description:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ DAY 2 of The 16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival

Sunday, October 30, 2011

10 AM - 4 PM
( Hosted by the Boston Vegetarian Society )

  • Worcester Vegan Meetup and VegWorcester members will be attending. Are you interested in carpooling with others? Are you able to offer a ride? If so, post in the comments! We recommend meeting to carpool from the Worcester area around 8:30am to leave and get to Boston right when the festival begins at 10am!
  •     This Festival brings together an amazing array of vegetarian natural food providers, top national speakers and chefs, and educational exhibitors in a fun and welcoming environment. It is a chance to talk directly to food producers, learn the newest items in the marketplace, taste free food samples, shop at show special discounts, or simply learn what vegetarian foods are available and where you can find them!
  •     Whether you are a longtime vegetarian or vegan, or someone simply wanting to add more healthy and delicious foods to your meal repertoire, or if you are just curious what it's all about, you are welcome here! Free admission, free food sampling, kids activities, free speaker presentations, free parking and a T stop across the street. You also can learn of ways to benefit the environment, help animals, and enhance your health and well being.
  •     More info is available at http://www.bostonveg.org/foodfest
item.how_to_find_us: Carpools from Worcester should meet up at 8:30am
item.name: The 16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival - Day 2
